::: The speeder came to a dead stop in a snow bank. The repulsor thrusts were 
blocked and there was no getting it out. MEGATRON jumped out into the clear 
night, followed by Rat Trap :::

::; MEGATRON ::: Damn! Now were stuck...

::: Rat Trap ::: Well boss....we could walk.

::: MEGATRON glared at Rat trap, with his answer :::

::: Rat Trap ::: Ok..I guess not. Well, what are you going to do now?

::: MEGATRON ::: We are going to.....going to.....

::: He scans the area. With his sensors he picks up an underground stream, 
and it leads back into the ocean. If they hauled the speeder into the stream 
they could float back into the ocean and head for the small keys that hooked 
out from the valley. They might be safe there, and it was unexplored 
territory. Perfect idea. ::::

::: MEGATRON ::: You three, pick up the speeder and follow me to that out 
cropping. Theres a stram there. I have an idea.

::: He picks up Quickstrike and hurls him over his shoulder, as Rat Trap 
begins to lift the speeder. :::

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

::: HELL BEAST looks to Brightblade ::: Ah, a true Predacon. Someone who will 
go far in my institution. 

::: he then turns to Goron ::: You two would make an excellent team! Your 
first assignment is to locate MEGATRON and follow him. I want to know where 
he is, what he is doing, and if he is armed.

::: He then turns to RAMPAGE ::: Sub-commander, the Maximals have been pests 
for a long while. And I do recall you planning our next attack. If you would 
please get right on that I would be most happy.

::: HELL BEAST, in his command chair looked to his others ::: begins repairs 
on the ship, and modifications. This is our sanctuary, and i will be damned 
if anyone gets inside of it agian. Our next attack on the Maximals shall be 
our greatest...if Rampage is a good enough general as I think he is, anyways.
